dc:title: Bed
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: A short story of the process involved in putting her daughter to bed and of the difficulty in getting her to fall asleep.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 34 1931-05-20 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
